revised_title: Sunspot Curve Analysis and Planetary Configuration Connection
tldr: This article presents two studies on sunspots, one by Prof. Wolf analyzing the form of the sunspot curve and the other by M. Fritz exploring the connection between sunspots, auroral and magnetic disturbances, and planetary configurations. Fritz concludes that the planets' influence on sunspots follows a specific order and that changes in planetary magnetic axes may have a significant impact.
